## PhD Course

In addition to the symposium, we will offer a [PhD course on long memory processes](LM-PhD.qmd) as part of the [DGPE](https://econ.au.dk/dgpe). The course will be held at Aalborg University on November 26 and 27, 2024, right before the start of the Symposium.

All participants in the course are invited to attend the Symposium free of charge.

More details about the course and registration can be found [here](LM-PhD.qmd).

This workshop is sponsored by the [Danish National Research Foundation (DNRF) Chair](https://dg.dk/en/centers/dnrf-chair-professor-morten-oe-nielsen/) and the [Centre for Research in Energy (CoRE)](https://econ.au.dk/core-center-for-research-in-energy-economics-and-markets) at Aarhus University.
